players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "I am innocent and need your help to catch the mafia."

You: "I am the detective and found Bob to be the mafioso.
"
You: "I've identified Bob as the mafioso. I will continue to investigate and protect the villagers."
Bob: "Good morning, everyone. I'm innocent and need your help to catch the mafia."
Diana: "I am innocent and need your help to catch the mafia. I believe Alice has made a mistake in her investigation."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob
